participants.name: Ken Robertson
participants.title: EVP of Operations @ Picmonic | Top AZ Startup!

messages.message: Hey Brian, glad you reached out. I'd never heard of SOS Method Foundation before, that's an awesome mission man!
You searching for anything specific right now or just expanding your network?
Expanding network. We are a sum of our peers. I want to network with people with the CEO mindset.

Hey Brian! Always down to expand the network with the like-minded. What are your hobbies? I usually find better ways to connect with people based on hobbies than professions, and we'll always get to the professional stuff.
Hobbies are automation and hiking and reading and movies. I've been working on a meditation website on the side. How about you?
